markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Leshy Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=4495) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Leshy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=225" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 68 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You deeply understand your people’s cultural traditions and innate strengths. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) and [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15). If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

You also gain the [Additional Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=750) general feat for Leshy [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8).
name: Leshy Lore
